item.title: 中东紧张局势和经济数据提振石油维持上周涨势
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价变化不大，受地缘政治紧张局势和经济数据向好的支撑，保持了上周超过3%的大部分涨幅。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early Asian trading on Monday, holding on to most of last week's more than 3% gains, supported by geopolitical tensions and better economic data.】

item.title: 亚洲股市享受通胀考验前的平静
item.description: 本周一，亚洲股市开局平静，因为日本的假期消除了近期波动的一个根源，投资者静待美国和中国的主要经济数据，以了解全球经济增长前景的最新情况。【原文：Asian stocks got the week off to a quiet start on Monday as a holiday in Japan removed one source of recent volatility, and investors hunkered down for major U.S. and Chinese economic data for an update on global growth prospects.】

item.title: 央行与债券多头针锋相对，中国债券市场剑拔弩张
item.description: 中国是世界第二大债券市场，在经历了动荡的一周后，中国央行开始大力干预，以阻止收益率的暴跌，即使经济正在挣扎。【原文：China's bond market, the world's second largest, is on edge following a turbulent week in which the central bank started intervening heavily to stem a plunge in yields even as the economy is struggling.】

item.title: 阿根廷油籽工人罢工接近一周大关
item.description: 周一，阿根廷油籽工人的罢工将持续到第七天，因为与公司的工资谈判仍然停滞不前，影响到世界主要谷物出口国之一的阿根廷的装运。【原文：An oilseed workers' strike in Argentina is set to carry on into its seventh day on Monday as wage negotiations with firms remained stalled, affecting shipments from one of the world's major grain exporters.】

item.title: 研究显示，2023 年英国首席执行官的薪酬将创历史新高
item.description: 周一的研究显示，英国最大公司的老板们在 2023 年的薪酬创下了新高，有九家公司为他们提供了超过 1,000 万英镑（约合 1,275 万美元）的待遇，而英国工人们正在为提高工资而争论不休。【原文：The bosses of Britain's biggest companies enjoyed record pay in 2023, with nine firms offering them packages of more than 10 million pounds ($12.75 million), research on Monday showed, as British workers argue for higher wages.】

item.title: 早间竞价：波动性冲击减弱，印度 CPI 上涨
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官：如果不降息，美国消费者可能会气馁
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周日表示，如果美国联邦储备委员会不尽快开始降息，美国消费者可能会变得萎靡不振。【原文：If the U.S. Federal Reserve does not start cutting interest rates relatively soon, U.S. consumers could become dispirited, Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度市场监管机构要求投资者对针对首席执行官的兴登堡指控保持冷静
item.description: 印度市场监管机构周日要求投资者保持冷静，在对美国做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）等机构的报告做出反应之前，要进行尽职调查。【原文：India's markets regulator on Sunday asked investors to remain calm and exercise due diligence before reacting to reports such as that by US-based shortseller Hindenburg Research.】

item.title: 研究人员称，GPS欺骗器 "黑进 "商业航空公司的时间
item.description: 据网络安全研究人员称，最近全球定位系统 "欺骗"（一种可使商用客机偏离航线的数字攻击形式）的激增进入了一个耐人寻味的新层面：黑客攻击时间的能力。【原文：A recent surge in GPS “spoofing”, a form of digital attack which can send commercial airliners off course, has entered an intriguing new dimension, according to cybersecurity researchers: The ability to hack time.】

item.title: 迪士尼有望宣布其主题公园计划
item.description: 华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）预计将于周六在其 D23 影迷大会上宣布公司主题公园的新景点，并透露公司将如何开始部署 600 亿美元的资本投资。【原文：Walt Disney is expected to announce new attractions at the company's theme parks Saturday at its D23 fan convention, revealing how the company will begin deploying $60 billion in capital investments.】

item.title: 兴登堡研究称印度市场监管机构负责人持有阿达尼集团使用的离岸基金投资
item.description: 总部位于美国的做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）在周六发布的一份新报告中称，印度市场监管机构主席玛达比-普里-布赫（Madhabi Puri Buch）持有某些离岸基金的投资，而阿达尼集团也在使用这些基金。【原文：U.S. based short-seller Hindenburg Research in a new report released on Saturday alleged that the chairperson of India's market regulator Madhabi Puri Buch held investments in certain offshore funds that were also used by the Adani group.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯关闭钢铁部门的资金申请
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯周六表示，其钢铁部门必须进行重组，以便用自己的盈利为投资需求提供资金，但母公司已为未来两年提供了资金保障。【原文：Thyssenkrupp said on Saturday its steel division must be restructured to fund investment needs with its own earnings, but that the parent company had provided financial security for the next two years.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼：如果通胀持续下降，将需要降息
item.description: 周六，美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）略微缓和了其一贯的鹰派基调，她指出，过去几个月通胀方面取得了一些进一步的 "可喜 "进展，但她同时表示，通胀率仍 "令人不安地高于 "央行2%的目标，并面临上行风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman softened her usually hawkish tone ever so slightly on Saturday, noting some further "welcome" progress on inflation in the last couple months even as she said inflation remains "uncomfortably above" the central bank's 2% goal and subject to upside risks.】

item.title: 谷歌首席执行官表示，YouTube 前首席执行官苏珊-沃西基（Susan Wojcicki）去世，享年 56 岁
item.description: 谷歌首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）周六在社交媒体平台 X 上表示，YouTube 前首席执行官、谷歌首批员工之一苏珊-沃西基（Susan Wojcicki）因癌症去世，享年 56 岁。【原文：YouTube ex-CEO and one of the first Google employees Susan Wojcicki has died at the age of 56 after two years of living with cancer, Google Chief Executive Sundar Pichai said on social media platform X on Saturday.】

item.title: 特斯拉停止接受最廉价 Cybertruck 的订单，现在提供 10 万美元的版本
item.description: 特斯拉网站显示，特斯拉已停止接受售价为 6.1 万美元的最便宜版本 Cybertruck 的订单，而 10 万美元版本的 Cybertruck 则可立即订购，最快本月交付。【原文：Tesla has stopped taking orders for the least expensive version of its Cybertruck, which is priced at $61,000, while making the $100,000 version available for immediate order and delivery as soon as this month, its website showed.】

item.title: 受 "胁迫 "的摩根大通寻求结束在纽约对俄罗斯 VTB 银行的诉讼
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周五要求曼哈顿的一名美国法官驳回其针对俄罗斯 VTB 银行在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后冻结的 4.395 亿美元账户提起的诉讼，称 VTB 银行 "胁迫 "摩根大通要求驳回诉讼。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Friday asked a U.S. judge in Manhattan to dismiss its lawsuit against Russia's VTB Bank over a $439.5 million account frozen after Russia invaded Ukraine, saying VTB "coerced" it into requesting the dismissal.】

item.title: 花旗集团称财富部门将出售信托服务业务
item.description: 花旗集团财富部门周五发表声明称，已启动出售信托管理和信托服务业务的程序。 "该行表示："为了更加专注于为全球客户提供最重要的财富结构建议，花旗财富已启动出售信托管理-信托服务平台的程序。【原文：Citigroup's wealth unit has initiated a process to sell its trust administration and fiduciary services business, the bank said in a statement on Friday. "To enhance our focus on delivering the wealth structuring advice that matters most to our global clients, Citi Wealth has initiated a process to sell our trust administration-fiduciary services platform", the bank said.】

item.title: 波音公司获得美国空军价值 25.6 亿美元的 E-7A "楔尾 "飞机合同
item.description: 波音公司周五表示，已获得美国空军价值 25.6 亿美元的两架 E-7A AEW&C Wedgetail 快速原型机合同。【原文：Boeing said on Friday it had been awarded a $2.56 billion contract from the U.S. Air Force for two rapid prototype E-7A AEW&C Wedgetail aircraft.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 7 月下旬利空减少 2
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所周五表示，7 月下旬纳斯达克指数的空头兴趣下降了 2%。【原文：Short interest on the Nasdaq declined 2% in late July, the exchange said on Friday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进派 Starboard Value 参股星巴克
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 持有星巴克股份，并希望这家咖啡巨头采取措施提高股价。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value has a stake in Starbucks and wants the coffee giant to take steps to improve its stock price, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲资金流向 银行称对冲基金扎堆押注看跌日股
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周五在一份报告中称，在8月2日至8月8日的一周内，对冲基金以五年多来最快的速度增加了对日本股市的看跌押注，因为8月5日日经指数遭遇了自1987年黑色星期一以来最糟糕的一天。【原文：Hedge funds added bearish bets in Japanese stocks at the fastest pace in over five years for a week between Aug. 2 and Aug. 8, as the Nikkei on Aug. 5 faced the worst day for the index since Black Monday in 1987, Goldman Sachs said in a note on Friday.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车公司 WeRide 着眼于在美国上市，估值最高可达 50 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于中国的自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 周五表示，它正在美国寻求高达 50.2 亿美元的首次公开募股估值。【原文：China-based autonomous driving startup WeRide said on Friday it was seeking a valuation of as much as $5.02 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司就野火赔偿融资提出持续经营质疑
item.description: 公用事业公司夏威夷电力公司周五透露，它没有为本月初达成的价值 17.1 亿美元的茂宜岛野火赔偿协议制定融资计划，这引发了对公司持续经营能力的质疑。【原文：Utility firm Hawaiian Electric raised going concern doubts on Friday after it revealed that it does not have a financing plan for the $1.71 billion Maui wildfire settlement reached earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称已解决对 Ideanomics 现任和前任高管的欺诈指控
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五表示，该委员会就 Ideanomics 公司、其首席执行官和两名前高管在 2017 年至 2019 年期间误导性财务报告和信息披露行为的欺诈指控达成和解。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Friday that it settled fraud charges against Ideanomics Inc., its CEO and two former executives for misleading financial reporting and disclosure practices between 2017 and 2019.】

item.title: CFTC 和伦敦证交所数据显示杠杆基金削减日元空头头寸
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission）和伦敦证交所集团（LSEG）周五公布的数据显示，最近一周杠杆基金对日元的头寸缩减至2023年2月以来的最小净空头头寸。【原文：Leveraged funds' position on the Japanese yen shrank to the smallest net short stance since February 2023 in the latest week, U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission and LSEG data released on Friday showed.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称五年期国债期货空头押注创历史之最
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会周五公布的数据显示，投机者最近一周对五年期国债的净空头押注升至有记录以来的最大值，而对十年期国债期货的看跌押注则创下二月份以来的最大值。【原文：Speculators raised their net short bets on five-year Treasuries to the largest on record in the latest week, while bearish bets on 10-year Treasury futures were the largest since February, according to data by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Friday.】

item.title: Smartmatic 高管被控为获得投票技术合同贿赂菲律宾官员
item.description: 据美国佛罗里达州联邦检察官称，投票技术公司 Smartmatic 的三名高管被指控向菲律宾前选举官员行贿 100 万美元，以确保该国的业务。【原文：Three executives of voting technology company Smartmatic have been charged with funneling $1 million in bribes to a former Philippine election official to secure the country’s business, according to U.S. federal prosecutors in Florida.】

item.title: 中国央行称将增加国债交易
item.description: 中国央行周五发布的第二季度货币政策执行报告称，中国央行将努力 "丰富 "其货币政策工具箱，并将在公开市场操作中逐步增加国债买卖。【原文：China's central bank will seek to "enrich" its monetary policy toolbox and will gradually increase buying and selling of treasury bonds in its open market operations, its second-quarter monetary policy implementation report said on Friday.】

item.title: Netflix 与哥伦比亚广播公司体育频道合作，制作圣诞节当天的 NFL 比赛
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）旗下的哥伦比亚广播公司体育频道（CBS Sports）将制作两场全国橄榄球联盟（NFL）的比赛，定于今年圣诞节在 Netflix 上播出。【原文：Paramount Global owned CBS Sports will produce the two National Football League (NFL) games set to be aired on Netflix on Christmas Day this year, the video streaming platform said on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 打败了小肯尼迪的反疫苗组织提起的审查诉讼
item.description: Meta Platforms 驳回了由小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Meta Platforms defeated an appeal by Children's Health Defense, an anti-vaccine group founded by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., challenging its censorship of Facebook posts that spread misinformation about vaccines' efficacy and safety.】
